biocontainers.name: bcool
biocontainers.summary: Bcool is a read corrector for ngs sequencing data that align reads on a de bruijn graph. version described at (https://arxiv.org/abs/1711.03336) presented at recomb-seq 2018

biotools.summary:
self-correction of short reads via mapping on de Bruijn graphs.

de Bruijn graph cOrrectiOn from graph aLignment.

Bcool clone and compile Bcalm2 Bgreat2 Btrim and Ntcard
